trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref>-derived objects in a control that acts as a wizard.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma coleção de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"> </xref>-derivada objetos num controlo que age como um assistente.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Esta classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: The WizardStepCollection class is used to store and manage a collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-derived objects in a control that acts as a wizard, such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control.
trans-unit.target: A classe de WizardStepCollection é utilizada para armazenar e gerir uma coleção de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-derivada objetos num controlo que age como um assistente, tais como o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>controlo ou <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control uses the WizardStepCollection class for its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.WizardSteps%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>controlo utiliza a classe de WizardStepCollection para o respetivo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.WizardSteps%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.WizardSteps%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>

trans-unit.source: There are multiple ways you can access the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-derived objects in the WizardStepCollection: - Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.Item%2A> property to directly access a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-derived object at a specific zero-based index.
trans-unit.target: Existem várias formas de poder aceder a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-derivada objetos a WizardStepCollection:-Utilize o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.Item%2A>propriedade aceda diretamente a um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-derivado do objeto num índice baseado em zero específico.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.Item%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>

trans-unit.source: - Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.GetEnumerator%2A> method to create an enumerator that can be used to iterate through the collection.
trans-unit.target: -Utilize o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.GetEnumerator%2A>método para criar um enumerador que pode ser utilizado para iterar através da coleção.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.GetEnumerator%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.CopyTo%2A> method to copy the contents of the WizardStepCollection collection into an <xref:System.Array> object.
trans-unit.target: -Utilize o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.CopyTo%2A>método para copiar o conteúdo da coleção WizardStepCollection para um <xref:System.Array>objeto.</xref:System.Array> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.CopyTo%2A>

trans-unit.source: Appends the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref>-derived object to the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: Acrescenta especificado <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"> </xref>-derivado do objeto para o fim da colecção.

trans-unit.source: The Add method adds the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-derived object to the end of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: O método Add adiciona o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-derivado do objeto até ao fim do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection>coleção.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>

trans-unit.source: To add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-derived object to the collection at a specific index location, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.AddAt%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para adicionar um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-derivado objeto à coleção de uma localização de índice específico, utilize o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.AddAt%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.AddAt%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref>-derived object to append to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"> </xref>-derivado do objeto a acrescentar para o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection"> </xref> coleção.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref>-derived object passed in is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"> </xref>-derivado objeto transmitido é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref>-derived object to the collection at the specified index location.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona especificado <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"> </xref>-derivada objeto à coleção na localização de índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: The AddAt method adds the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-derived object to the collection at the specified index location.
trans-unit.target: O método AddAt adiciona o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-derivada objeto à coleção na localização de índice especificado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>

trans-unit.source: To add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-derived object to the end of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection> collection, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.Add%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para adicionar um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-derivado do objeto até ao fim do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection>coleção, utilize o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.Add%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.Add%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>

trans-unit.source: The index location at which to insert <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref>-derived object.
trans-unit.target: A localização de índice no qual pretende inserir <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"> </xref>-derivado do objeto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref>-derived object to append to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"> </xref>-derivado do objeto a acrescentar para o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection"> </xref> coleção.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref>-derived object passed in is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"> </xref>-derivado objeto transmitido é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Removes all <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref>-derived objects from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Remove todos os <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"> </xref>-derivada objetos da coleção.

trans-unit.source: Use the Clear method to remove all the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-derived objects from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: Utilizar o método Clear remover todas as o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-derivada objetos a partir de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection>coleção.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > After the Clear method removes the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-derived objects from the collection, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.Count%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection> collection has a value of zero.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Método após o Clear remove o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-derivada objetos da coleção, o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.Count%2A>propriedade do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection>coleção tem um valor de zero.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.Count%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection"></xref> collection contains a specific <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref>-derived object.
trans-unit.target: Determina se o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection"> </xref> coleção contém específico <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"> </xref>-derivado do objeto.

trans-unit.source: Use the Contains method to determine whether a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-derived object is contained in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o método contém para determinar se um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-objeto derivada está contido na coleção.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>

trans-unit.source: This method is commonly used to test for the existence of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-derived object before performing a task, such as removing a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-derived object from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Este método é normalmente utilizado para testar a existência de um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-objeto derivada antes de executar uma tarefa, tal como remover um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-derivado do objeto da coleção.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref>-derived object to find in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"> </xref>-derivada objeto localizar no <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection"> </xref> coleção.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref>-derived object is found in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection"></xref> collection; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"> </xref>-derivado objeto se encontra no <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection"> </xref> coleção; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: wizardStep is .
trans-unit.target: wizardStepis .

trans-unit.source: Copies all the items from a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection"></xref> collection to a compatible one-dimensional array of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref> objects, starting at the specified index in the target array.
trans-unit.target: Copia todos os itens de um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection"> </xref> coleção a uma matriz unidimensional compatível de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"> </xref> objetos, que começa no índice especificado na matriz de destino.

trans-unit.source: Use the CopyTo method to copy the contents of the collection into the specified zero-based array.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o método CopyTo para copiar o conteúdo da coleção para a matriz baseada em zero especificada.

trans-unit.source: Items are copied starting at the specified index of the target array.
trans-unit.target: Itens são copiados a partir do índice da matriz de destino especificado.

trans-unit.source: After the items are in an array, you can use array syntax to access the items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: Depois dos itens estão numa matriz, pode utilizar a sintaxe de matriz para aceder aos itens a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection>coleção.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection>

trans-unit.source: As an alternative, you can also use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.GetEnumerator%2A> method to create an enumerator that can be used to access the items in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Como alternativa, também pode utilizar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.GetEnumerator%2A>método para criar um enumerador que pode ser utilizado para aceder aos itens na coleção.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.GetEnumerator%2A>

trans-unit.source: A zero-based array of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref> objects that receives the items copied from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz baseada em zero do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"> </xref> objetos que recebe os itens copiados da coleção.

trans-unit.source: The position in the target array at which the array starts receiving the copied items.
trans-unit.target: A posição da matriz de destino em que a matriz é iniciado receber os itens copiados.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref>-derived objects in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"></xref> control's <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o número de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"> </xref>-derivada objetos a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"> </xref> do controlo <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection"> </xref> coleção.

trans-unit.source: Use the Count property to determine the number of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-derived objects in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: Utilize a propriedade de contagem para determinar o número de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-derivada objetos a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection>coleção.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>

trans-unit.source: The Count property is commonly used when iterating through the collection to determine its upper bound.
trans-unit.target: Na propriedade Count é normalmente utilizada quando a repetir a coleção para determinar o respetivo limite superior.

trans-unit.source: The number of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref>-derived objects in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: O número de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"> </xref>-derivada objetos a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: Returns an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>-implemented object that can be used to iterate through the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref>-derived objects in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>-implementado objetos que podem ser utilizados para iterar através de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"> </xref>-derivada objetos na coleção.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>-implemented object that contains all the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref>-derived objects in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>-implementado o objeto que contém todos os o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"> </xref>-derivada objetos a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection"> </xref> coleção.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: Determines the index value that represents the position of the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref>-derived object in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Determina o valor de índice que representa a posição da especificado <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"> </xref>-derivado do objeto na coleção.

trans-unit.source: Use the IndexOf method to determine the index of the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-derived object in the current <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o método IndexOf para determinar o índice especificado da <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-derivado do objeto na atual <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection>coleção.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-derived object is not in the collection, the method returns -1.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-derivado do objeto não existe na coleção, o método devolve -1.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref>-derived object to search for in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"> </xref>-derivado do objeto para procurar no <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection"> </xref> coleção.

trans-unit.source: If found, the zero-based index of the first occurrence of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref>-derived object passed in within the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection"></xref> collection; otherwise, -1.
trans-unit.target: Se encontrado, o índice baseado em zero da primeira ocorrência da <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"> </xref>-derivado objeto transmitido na atual <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection"> </xref> coleção; caso contrário, -1.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref>-derived object passed in is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"> </xref>-derivado objeto transmitido é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Inserts the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref>-derived object into the collection at the specified index location.
trans-unit.target: Insere especificado <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"> </xref>-derivada objeto à coleção na localização de índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: The Insert method adds the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-derived object to the collection at the specified index location.
trans-unit.target: O método Insert adiciona o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-derivada objeto à coleção na localização de índice especificado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.AddAt%2A> method to add the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-derived object to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Em alternativa, pode utilizar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.AddAt%2A>método para adicionar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-derivada objeto à coleção.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.AddAt%2A>

trans-unit.source: To add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-derived object to the end of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection> collection, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.Add%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para adicionar um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-derivado do objeto até ao fim do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection>coleção, utilize o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.Add%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.Add%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The Insert method and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.AddAt%2A> method perform essentially the same function.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Inserir o método e o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.AddAt%2A>método efetuar, essencialmente, a mesma função.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.AddAt%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the Insert method is called, it simply passes the `wizardStep` and `index` parameters to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.AddAt%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Quando se chama o método de inserção, basta passar o `wizardStep` e `index` parâmetros para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.AddAt%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.AddAt%2A>

trans-unit.source: The index location at which to insert the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref>-derived object.
trans-unit.target: A localização de índice no qual pretende inserir a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"> </xref>-derivado do objeto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref>-derived object to insert into the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"> </xref>-derivado do objeto a inserir o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection"> </xref> coleção.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref>-derived objects in the collection can be modified.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"> </xref>-derivados objetos da coleção podem ser modificados.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection"></xref> collection can be modified; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection"> </xref> coleção pode ser modificada; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether access to the collection is synchronized (thread-safe).
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o acesso à coleção está sincronizado (seguro para thread).

trans-unit.source: This property is derived from the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface and is overridden to always return `false`.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade é derivada de <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>interface e seja substituída para devolver sempre `false`.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: For more information on the IsSynchronized property, see the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized%2A> property of the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a propriedade IsSynchronized, consulte a <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized%2A>propriedade da <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>interface</xref:System.Collections.ICollection> </xref:System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>em todos os casos.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref>-derived object from the collection at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"> </xref>-derivado do objeto da coleção no índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: Use the Item property to retrieve the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-derived object at the specified index location in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection> collection using array notation.
trans-unit.target: Utilize a propriedade do Item para obter o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-derivado do objeto na localização no índice especificado o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection>coleção utilizando a notação de matriz.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>

trans-unit.source: The index of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStep"></xref> object to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: O índice do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStep"> </xref> o objeto a obter.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref>-derived object in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection"></xref> collection at the specified index location.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"> </xref>-derivado do objeto no <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection"> </xref> coleção a localização do índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref>-derived object from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Remove o especificado <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"> </xref>-derivado do objeto da coleção.

trans-unit.source: Use the Remove method to remove the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-derived object from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o método de remover para remover o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-derivado do objeto a partir do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection>coleção.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.RemoveAt%2A> method to remove a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-derived object from a specified location in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: Em alternativa, pode utilizar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.RemoveAt%2A>método para remover um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-derivado do objeto a partir de uma localização especificada no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection>coleção.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.RemoveAt%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref>-derived object to remove from the collection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"> </xref>-derivado do objeto para remover da coleção.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref>-derived object passed in is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"> </xref>-derivado objeto transmitido é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Removes the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref>-derived object from the collection at the specified location.
trans-unit.target: Remove o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"> </xref>-derivado do objeto da coleção na localização especificada.

trans-unit.source: Use the RemoveAt method to remove the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-derived object from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection> collection at the specified index location.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o método do RemoveAt para remover o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-derivado do objeto a partir do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection>coleção a localização do índice especificado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can remove a specific <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-derived object from the collection using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.Remove%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Em alternativa, pode remover específico <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-derivado que o objeto da coleção a utilizar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.Remove%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.Remove%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>

trans-unit.source: The index of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref>-derived object to remove.
trans-unit.target: O índice do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"> </xref>-derivado do objeto para remover.

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um objeto que pode ser utilizado para sincronizar o acesso à coleção.

trans-unit.source: The object returned in this implementation is the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection> object itself.
trans-unit.target: O objeto devolvido nesta implementação é o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection>objeto propriamente dito.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection>

trans-unit.source: For more information on the SyncRoot property, see the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A> property of the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a propriedade SyncRoot, consulte o <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>interface.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection> </xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A>

trans-unit.source: An object that can be used to synchronize access to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que pode ser utilizado para sincronizar acesso para o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection"> </xref> coleção.

trans-unit.source: Copies all the items from a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection"></xref> collection to a one-dimensional array, starting at the specified index in the target array.
trans-unit.target: Copia todos os itens de um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection"> </xref> coleção a uma matriz unidimensional, que começa no índice especificado na matriz de destino.

trans-unit.source: A zero-based <xref:System.Array> that receives the items copied from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: Um baseado em zero <xref:System.Array>que recebe os itens copiados a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection"> </xref> coleção.</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The position in the target array at which to start receiving the copied content.
trans-unit.target: A posição da matriz de destino no qual pretende iniciar a receber o conteúdo copiado.

trans-unit.source: Appends the specified object to the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: Acrescenta o objeto especificado para o fim da colecção.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> to append to the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Object>a acrescentar para o fim da colecção.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The position into which the new element was inserted.
trans-unit.target: A posição em que foi inserido o novo elemento.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the collection contains the specified object.
trans-unit.target: Determina se a coleção contém o objeto especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> to locate in the collection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Object>Localizar na coleção.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Object> is found in the <xref:System.Collections.IList>; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref:System.Object>se encontra no <xref:System.Collections.IList>; caso contrário <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Collections.IList> </xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Determines the index value that represents the position of the specified object in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Determina o valor de índice que representa a posição do objeto especificado na coleção.

trans-unit.source: The object to search for in the collection.
trans-unit.target: O objeto para procurar na coleção.

trans-unit.source: The index value of the specified object in the collection.
trans-unit.target: O valor de índice do objeto especificado na coleção.

trans-unit.source: Inserts the specified object in the collection at the specified position.
trans-unit.target: Insere o objeto especificado na coleção na posição especificada.

trans-unit.source: The index at which to insert the object into the collection.
trans-unit.target: O índice no qual pretende inserir o objeto à coleção.

trans-unit.source: The object to insert into the collection.
trans-unit.target: O objeto a inserir na coleção.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the collection has a fixed size.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se a coleção tem um tamanho fixo.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the collection has a fixed size; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a coleção tem um tamanho fixo; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the object at the specified index in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o objeto no índice especificado na coleção.

trans-unit.source: This property provides the ability to access a specific element in the collection by using the following syntax: myCollection[index].
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade fornece a capacidade de aceder um elemento específico da coleção, utilizando a seguinte sintaxe: myCollection [Índice].

trans-unit.source: The index of the object to get from the collection.
trans-unit.target: O índice do objeto para obter da coleção.

trans-unit.source: The object to be retrieved.
trans-unit.target: O objeto a ser obtidos.

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified object from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Remove o objeto especificado da coleção.

trans-unit.source: The object to remove from the collection.
trans-unit.target: O objeto para remover da coleção.
